verbose_text: Blanchette et al. have shown that the same adenoviral E4orf6/E1B55k/Cul5 E3 Ub ligase complex responsible for degrading p53 and Mre11 is also necessary for viral mRNA transport from the nucleus.
evidence: E3 Ub ligase complex responsible for degrading p53 and Mre11 is also necessary for viral mRNA transport
